isInvalid.description: Whether the tag is invalid or not.
isInvalid.name: isInvalid

isLoading.description: Whether the tag is loading or not.
isLoading.name: isLoading

style.description: The inline [style](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement/style) for the element. A function may be provided to compute the style based on component state.
style.name: style

id.description: A unique id for the tag.
id.name: id

textValue.description:
A string representation of the tags's contents, used for accessibility.
Required if children is not a plain text string.
textValue.name: textValue

children.description: The children of the component. A function may be provided to alter the children based on component state.
children.name: children

className.description: The CSS [className](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/className) for the element. A function may be provided to compute the class based on component state.
className.name: className

href.description: A URL to link to. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/a#href).
href.name: href

hrefLang.description: Hints at the human language of the linked URL. See[MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/a#hreflang).
hrefLang.name: hrefLang

target.description: The target window for the link. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/a#target).
target.name: target

rel.description: The relationship between the linked resource and the current page. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/rel).
rel.name: rel

download.description: Causes the browser to download the linked URL. A string may be provided to suggest a file name. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/a#download).
download.name: download

ping.description: A space-separated list of URLs to ping when the link is followed. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/a#ping).
ping.name: ping

referrerPolicy.description: How much of the referrer to send when following the link. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/a#referrerpolicy).
referrerPolicy.name: referrerPolicy

routerOptions.description: Options for the configured client side router.
routerOptions.name: routerOptions

onHoverStart.description: Handler that is called when a hover interaction starts.
onHoverStart.name: onHoverStart

onHoverEnd.description: Handler that is called when a hover interaction ends.
onHoverEnd.name: onHoverEnd

onHoverChange.description: Handler that is called when the hover state changes.
onHoverChange.name: onHoverChange

style.name: style

Required if children is not a plain text string.

hrefLang.name: hrefLang

target.name: target

rel.name: rel

download.name: download

ping.name: ping

referrerPolicy.name: referrerPolicy

routerOptions.description: Options for the configured client side router.
routerOptions.name: routerOptions

onHoverStart.name: onHoverStart

onHoverEnd.name: onHoverEnd
